text: Ndipo pakati pawo alipo ena amene amanyoza Mtumwi ponena kuti: “Iye amangomvera chili chonse.” Nena: “Iye amamvetsera zinthu zimene zili zabwino kwa inu. Iye amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndipo Iye amakhulupilira anthu okhulupirira, ndipo iye ndi madalitso kwa ena a inu amene amakhulupilira.” Koma iwo amene amanyoza Mtumwi wa Mulungu adzakhala ndi chilango chowawa
